desc: Lighten the color a given amount, from 0 to 100. Providing 100 will always return white.
Brighten the color a given amount, from 0 to 100.
Darken the color a given amount, from 0 to 100. Providing 100 will always return black.
Desaturate the color a given amount, from 0 to 100. Providing 100 will is the same as calling greyscale.
Saturate the color a given amount, from 0 to 100.
Completely desaturates a color into greyscale
Spin the hue a given amount, from -360 to 360. Calling with 0, 360, or -360 will do nothing - since it sets the hue back to what it was before.
Mixes colors by their RGB component values. Amount is opacity of overlaying color.
Modify red component by a given amount
Modify green component by a given amount
Modify blue component by a given amount
